RABBITMQ_HOST.description: The hostname of the RabbitMQ server (e.g., test.rabbit.com, localhost).
RABBITMQ_HOST.title: RABBITMQ_HOST

RABBITMQ_PORT.description: The port number to connect to the RabbitMQ server (e.g., 5672).
RABBITMQ_PORT.title: RABBITMQ_PORT

RABBITMQ_USERNAME.description: The username to authenticate with the RabbitMQ server.
RABBITMQ_USERNAME.title: RABBITMQ_USERNAME

RABBITMQ_PASSWORD.description: The password for the RabbitMQ username provided.
RABBITMQ_PASSWORD.title: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD

USE_TLS.description: Set to true if using TLS (AMQPS), otherwise false.
USE_TLS.title: USE_TLS
